effect.en: Search your deck for up to 3 Water Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
effect.es: Busca en tu baraja hasta 3 cartas de Energía Water, enséñalas y ponlas en tu mano. Después, baraja las cartas de tu baraja.
effect.pt: Search your deck for up to 3 Water Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
effect.de: Durchsuche dein Deck nach bis zu 3 Water-Energiekarten, zeige sie deinem Gegner und nimm sie auf deine Hand. Mische anschließend dein Deck.

description.en: If it builds up enough speed swimming, it can jump out above the waves and glide for over 300 feet.
